name: Irish Bioenergy Association
goal: Promote the use of bioenergy in Ireland including, wood fuel, biodiesel, bioethanol, biogas and biomethane. Participate in bioenergy-related research projects. Conduct field-trips and other educational activities for our members. Organise a large annual conference.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Renewable Energy, Environment, Green House Gas Reduction, Circular Economy, Life Cycle Analysis, Rural Affairs, EU goals and targets in Renewable Energy, RED
